text_block_list.text: Mihono Bourbon, 7-games winning streak.

In the overwhelming performance, “Triple Crown” the expectations 
of the world were rising day by day after the great achievement.

text_block_list.name: Horse Girl A
text_block_list.text: Mihono Bourbon-san! Shake my hand, please!

text_block_list.name: Horse Girl B
text_block_list.text: Me too, sign please!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Me too! Draw “Mihono Bourbon” with ketchup 
on this omelet rice and make it cute!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
I got it, I do not know what you mean by the last one well, but I 
will try to do it well.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Possibly adorable…. Possibly adorable…

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Oh, good! It's a good line!!
(Pinbon, Pinbon)

text_block_list.name: School Broadcast
text_block_list.text:
Mihono Bourbon-san, the student council president is calling for 
you. Please come to the student council room.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: …. Rudolf President?
(Knock, Knock)

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Come in.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Excuse me. Did you call for me? Rudolf president.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Oh, actually, I have received a lot of requests for interviews. I 
would like to ask for permission from you.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
In any case , the undefeated triple crown domination is in front 
you. Everyone around us has great expectations.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Many expectations… Do you feel the pressure?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: No, even if I was feeling it, I will turn it into power.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Well, it seems that you are prepared to be a strong horse girl.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
The Triple Crown also requires strength of mind. I want you to 
run with your usual Bourbon.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Understood.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: … However, the Triple Crown won't be an easy win, I feel it.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Rice Shower…. Every time I win over her, for some reason such 
feelings become stronger.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I understand, to you this girl is. No, it 
is not necessary to put it into words.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I'm not going to favor either of you, but I'm hoping for a good 
race to finish this season's race.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: I will remember it.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Leaving that matter aside, president. 
There is something I want to ask.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: If you are okay with me, ask me anything.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: When writing a sign, what should I do to make it more cute?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: That's, a difficult question for me too.
Before Training in the Trainer room.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Well then! I got Bourbon's autograph!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Why is it Omelet rice?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: …what a cute character.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
this is a present for Rice! Because You're 
a big eater despite your looks!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: eh, heh!? It's embarrassing so don't tell!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Straight-cut Bangs
text_block_list.text: Even so, it is a topic of Bourbon-san.

She's undefeated so far, so it's natural that 
people who are watching are not satisfied yet, 
but their expectations are too high.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I don't have eyes of doubt that. Rice-san has the ability to 
rival the horse girl of that topic.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: The difference that shrinks with every race is proof of that.

Even though Rice Shower was defeated by Mihono Bourbon again, the 
gap was even smaller than that of the derby.

In addition to that, Rice Shower now has a stronger feeling 
towards winning over Mihono Bourbon.
choice_data_list: I'm sure you will win the (Kikkashou).

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Yeah.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Huh? Somehow, you're full of self-confidence!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I've been training a lot with everyone, 
i was able to run really well.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I'm so excited. Rice wants to hurry and run with Bourbon-san .

The fact that Rice Shower has come to feel excitement rather than 
anxiety about racing is proof of growth.

She continued to face challenges many times, and the result that 
the difference was steadily decreasing has given her confidence.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Yosh! Let's start training for today! 
for now you will run 3 laps!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: This is over 3,000 Km?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san, Rice will do her best.

Of the expectations for the rising Mihono Bourbon. I hope to be 
part of Rice Shower's ambition.
